							SG_APP_POPUP_URL = 'http://redhotandblue.com/wp-content/plugins/popup-builder';
							SG_POPUP_VERSION='2.676_1;';
							
							function sgAddEvent(element, eventName, fn) {
								if (element.addEventListener)
									element.addEventListener(eventName, fn, false);
								else if (element.attachEvent)
									element.attachEvent('on' + eventName, fn);

  <script type="text/javascript">
   function setREVStartSize(e){									
						try{ e.c=jQuery(e.c);var i=jQuery(window).width(),t=9999,r=0,n=0,l=0,f=0,s=0,h=0;
							if(e.responsiveLevels&&(jQuery.each(e.responsiveLevels,function(e,f){f>i&&(t=r=f,l=e),i>f&&f>r&&(r=f,n=e)}),t>r&&(l=n)),f=e.gridheight[l]||e.gridheight[0]||e.gridheight,s=e.gridwidth[l]||e.gridwidth[0]||e.gridwidth,h=i/s,h=h>1?1:h,f=Math.round(h*f),"fullscreen"==e.sliderLayout){var u=(e.c.width(),jQuery(window).height());if(void 0!=e.fullScreenOffsetContainer){var c=e.fullScreenOffsetContainer.split(",");if (c) jQuery.each(c,function(e,i){u=jQuery(i).length>0?u-jQuery(i).outerHeight(!0):u}),e.fullScreenOffset.split("%").length>1&&void 0!=e.fullScreenOffset&&e.fullScreenOffset.length>0?u-=jQuery(window).height()*parseInt(e.fullScreenOffset,0)/100:void 0!=e.fullScreenOffset&&e.fullScreenOffset.length>0&&(u-=parseInt(e.fullScreenOffset,0))}f=u}else void 0!=e.minHeight&&f<e.minHeight&&(f=e.minHeight);e.c.closest(".rev_slider_wrapper").css({height:f})					
						}catch(d){console.log("Failure at Presize of Slider:"+d)}						
					};
  </script>

             <script>
              var htmlDiv = document.getElementById("rs-plugin-settings-inline-css"); var htmlDivCss="";
				if(htmlDiv) {
					htmlDiv.innerHTML = htmlDiv.innerHTML + htmlDivCss;
				}else{
					var htmlDiv = document.createElement("div");
					htmlDiv.innerHTML = "<style>" + htmlDivCss + "</style>";
					document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(htmlDiv.childNodes[0]);
				}
             </script>
             <script type="text/javascript">
              if (setREVStartSize!==undefined) setREVStartSize(
	{c: '#rev_slider_32_1', gridwidth: [1100], gridheight: [600], sliderLayout: 'auto'});
			
var revapi32,
	tpj;	
(function() {			
	if (!/loaded|interactive|complete/.test(document.readyState)) document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",onLoad); else onLoad();	
	function onLoad() {				
		if (tpj===undefined) { tpj = jQuery; if("on" == "on") tpj.noConflict();}
	if(tpj("#rev_slider_32_1").revolution == undefined){
		revslider_showDoubleJqueryError("#rev_slider_32_1");
	}else{
		revapi32 = tpj("#rev_slider_32_1").show().revolution({
			sliderType:"standard",
			jsFileLocation:"//redhotandblue.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/public/assets/js/",
			sliderLayout:"auto",
			dottedOverlay:"none",
			delay:9000,
			navigation: {
				keyboardNavigation:"off",
				keyboard_direction: "horizontal",
				mouseScrollNavigation:"off",
 							mouseScrollReverse:"default",
				onHoverStop:"on",
				touch:{
					touchenabled:"on",
					touchOnDesktop:"off",
					swipe_threshold: 75,
					swipe_min_touches: 1,
					swipe_direction: "horizontal",
					drag_block_vertical: false
				}
			},
			visibilityLevels:[1240,1024,778,480],
			gridwidth:1100,
			gridheight:600,
			lazyType:"none",
			shadow:2,
			spinner:"spinner0",
			stopLoop:"off",
			stopAfterLoops:-1,
			stopAtSlide:-1,
			shuffle:"off",
			autoHeight:"off",
			hideThumbsOnMobile:"off",
			hideSliderAtLimit:0,
			hideCaptionAtLimit:0,
			hideAllCaptionAtLilmit:0,
			debugMode:false,
			fallbacks: {
				simplifyAll:"off",
				nextSlideOnWindowFocus:"off",
				disableFocusListener:false,
			}
		});
	}; /* END OF revapi call */
	
 }; /* END OF ON LOAD FUNCTION */
}()); /* END OF WRAPPING FUNCTION */
             </script>
            </div>
            <!-- END REVOLUTION SLIDER -->
            <div class="fusion-builder-row fusion-builder-row-inner fusion-row ">
             <div class="fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_1 fusion-one-full fusion-column-first fusion-column-last 1_1" style="margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 20px;">
              <div class="fusion-column-wrapper" data-bg-url="" style="border-width: 0px;border-color: ;border-style: ;padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px;background-position:left top;background-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-background-size:cover;-moz-background-size:cover;-o-background-size:cover;background-size:cover;">

                <h3 aria-hidden="true" class="modal-title" data-dismiss="modal" id="modal-heading-1">
                 About Red Hot &amp; Blue BBQ Restaurant &amp; Catering
                </h3>
               </div>
               <div class="modal-body">
                <p>
                 There are 20 Red Hot &amp; Blue corporate and franchise dine-in restaurants throughout the United States.
                </p>

                   Williamsburg
                  </strong>
                 </a>

                <p>
                 Red Hot &amp; Blue caters all type of events:
                </p>
                <p>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  • Wedding Receptions
                 </span>
                 <br/>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  • Rehearsal Dinners
                 </span>
                 <br/>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  • Anniversaries
                 </span>
                 <br/>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  • Birthdays
                 </span>
                 <br/>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  • Retirement
                 </span>
                 <br/>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  • Holiday Parties
                 </span>
                 <br/>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  • Company Picnics
                 </span>
                 <br/>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  • Topping Off Parties
                 </span>
                 <br/>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  • Business Events
                 </span>
                 <br/>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  • Luncheons
                 </span>
                 <br/>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  • Banquets
                 </span>
                </p>
                <p>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  <strong>
                   Price Range:
                  </strong>
                 </span>
                 $ = $6-$18
                </p>
                <p>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  <strong>
                   Payments Accepted:
                  </strong>
                 </span>
                 Cash, American Express, Discover, MasterCard, Visa
                </p>
                <p>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  <strong>
                   Cuisine:
                  </strong>
                 </span>
                 Authentic Memphis-style, slow, hickory-smoked barbeque, pulled pork, ribs, chicken wings, smoked chicken, oh-so-tender beef brisket, juicy burgers, seafood, salads, soups and stews, and yummy Southern-style sweets.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  <strong>
                   Full Bar Services
                  </strong>
                 </span>
                </p>
                <p>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  <strong>
                   Ambience:
                  </strong>
                 </span>
                 A fun and entertaining dining environment featuring blues-­themed memorabilia, legendary and contemporary blues music, serving up a heapin’ helpin’ of Southern hospitality.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <span style="color: #000000; font-size: large;">
                  <strong>
                   Dress Code:
                  </strong>
                 </span>
                 Casual! COME-AS-YOU-ARE
                </p>

                  <div class="fusion-column-wrapper" data-bg-url="" style="padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px;background-position:left top;background-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-background-size:cover;-moz-background-size:cover;-o-background-size:cover;background-size:cover;">

                     <br/>
                     <span style="color: #a7a9ac; font-size: small;">
                      A unique Southern tradition. Loaded with pulled pork, pulled chicken, beef brisket, potatoes, corn, onions and tomatoes, slow-cooked in a zesty blend of spices.
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <span style="color: #000000; font-size: medium;">
                      <strong>
                       AWARD-WINNING CHILI
                      </strong>
                     </span>
                     <br/>
                     <span style="color: #a7a9ac; font-size: small;">
                      Home-style chili loaded with beef brisket, kidney beans and tomatoes. Topped with cheese and diced onions.
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <span style="color: #000000; font-size: medium;">
                      <strong>
                       ASK ABOUT OUR “SOUP OF THE DAY”
                      </strong>
                     </span>
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_2 fusion-one-half fusion-column-last 1_2" style="margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 20px;width:48%">
                  <div class="fusion-column-wrapper" data-bg-url="" style="padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px;background-position:left top;background-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-background-size:cover;-moz-background-size:cover;-o-background-size:cover;background-size:cover;">
                   <div class="fusion-text">

                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>

            <div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="modal-heading-3" class="fusion-modal modal fade modal-3 fundraising" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
             <style type="text/css">

             <div class="modal-dialog modal-lg">
              <div class="modal-content fusion-modal-content" style="background-color:#f6f6f6">
               <div class="modal-header">
                <button aria-hidden="true" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
                 ×
                </button>
                <h3 aria-hidden="true" class="modal-title" data-dismiss="modal" id="modal-heading-3">
                 FUNDRAISING OPPORTUNITIES
                </h3>
               </div>
               <div class="modal-body">
                <a href="http://redhotandblue.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/RedHotBlueLogo_smoothie.jpg">
                 <img alt="RedHotBlueLogo_smoothie" class="alignleft wp-image-13075" height="23" src="http://redhotandblue.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/RedHotBlueLogo_smoothie.jpg" width="192"/>
                </a>
                <h3 style="text-align: left;">
                 <strong>
                  Fundraising Opportunities
                 </strong>
                </h3>
                <p>
                 As part of our corporate mission we are committed to have a positive impact on the communities where our restaurants are located. From partnering with neighborhood schools to fundraising events in the restaurant, we are committed to encouraging communities to come together while enjoying great food in the company of family and friends. Red Hot &amp; Blue has established a regional focus for charitable donations. Preference is given to organizations located in the communities that we have a restaurant located.
                </p>
                <p>
                 To be eligible to receive a gift card/certificate, food donation or hold a Spirit Night fundraising event, the requesting organization must be designated a 501(c)3 non-profit organization by the US Internal Revenue Service or an academic or athletic community organization.  Generally, the purpose of the organization, event or program must benefit persons or communities served by Red Hot &amp; Blue Restaurants, Inc.
                </p>
                <p>
                 Please fill out the online application below or
                 <a href="http://redhotandblue.com/pdf/Donation_FundraisingRequest1.pdf" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                  download a pdf to print and complete
                 </a>
                 .
                </p>

                </form>
                <h4>
                </h4>
                <h4>
                 <strong>
                  Fundraising Spirit Night Requests:
                 </strong>
                </h4>
                <p>
                 The Red Hot &amp; Blue Piggyback SPIRIT NIGHT fund-raising program provides an opportunity to raise money for school groups, athletic teams or non-profit charitable organizations. You can raise support and funds fast – and have a great time in the process! It’s easy! On designated fundraising days/nights, Red Hot &amp; Blue will donate 15% of the receipts from restaurant guests who bring in the flyer representing their fundraising event on the specific day/evening. You do the invitin’, we’ll take care of everything else. It’s a stress-free fundraising event for you!
                </p>
                <p>
                 <strong>
                  EASY STEPS TO HOLDING YOUR OWN FUNDRAISER:
                 </strong>
                </p>
                <p>
                 1. Complete the form online.
                 <br/>
                 2. The store manager will contact you and help you schedule your fundraising day/night.
                 <br/>
                 3. Red Hot &amp; Blue will send you an email with confirmation of the date requested and provide you with an electronic file of the flyer you will copy and distribute to members of your organization and your community.
                 <br/>
                 4. Advertise your event and remind participants to bring the flyer with them to Red Hot &amp; Blue to apply the 15% proceeds from each receipt to your organization fundraiser.
                 <br/>
                 5. Red Hot &amp; Blue will total the receipts of the flyers collected and within two weeks will mail a check to the address on the form.
                </p>
                <h4>
                 <strong>
                  Donation and Fundraising Request Guidelines:
                 </strong>
                </h4>
                <p>
                 • Restaurants are able to donate gift cards, gift baskets, food, beverages, merchandise and meeting space to nonprofit organizations. We do not provide sponsorships, scholarships or monetary donations.
                 <br/>
                 • Requests will be accepted only through the online application form below (preferred) or in writing on official letterhead that includes all the information as requested included form.
                 <br/>
                 • The requesting organization should be a 501(c)3 nonprofit or equivalent.
                 <br/>
                 • Requests must be submitted a minimum of 2-4 weeks/months prior to the scheduled event date/date of need.
                 <br/>
                 • Donations are not intended for use by individuals or groups for personal or corporate profit.
                 <br/>
                 • Unfortunately, we are not able to honor all requests that we receive, please accept our apology in advance if we are unable to fulfill your request.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <a href="http://redhotandblue.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/WebLogo.png">
                  <img alt="Red Hot &amp; Blue BBQ" class="aligncenter wp-image-13075" height="153" src="http://redhotandblue.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/WebLogo.png" width="193"/>
                 </a>
                </p>
                <p style="text-align: center;">
                 Red Hot &amp; Blue Restaurants
                </p>
               </div>
               <div class="modal-footer">

               <div class="modal-header">
                <button aria-hidden="true" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
                 ×
                </button>
                <h3 aria-hidden="true" class="modal-title" data-dismiss="modal" id="modal-heading-4">
                 EMPLOYMENT at Red Hot &amp; Blue
                </h3>
               </div>
               <div class="modal-body">
                <h3>
                 <strong>
                  Career Opportunities
                 </strong>
                </h3>
                <p>
                 Are you looking for a fun place to work? A place where you feel like you’re really appreciated? At Red Hot &amp; Blue, we offer flexible schedules, great training, competitive pay, an upbeat and comfortable work environment and great opportunity for advancement.
                </p>
                <p>
                 Our approach is simple and down to earth: Serve great ribs and BBQ, throw in a big helpin’ of Southern Hospitality and treat people right! We are always looking for talented people to join our “Pit Crew.”
                </p>
                <h3>
                 <strong>
                  Servers, Bartenders, Kitchen Staff, Hostess and Busboy Positions:
                 </strong>
                </h3>
                <p>
                 Fill out the form below to submit your application for employment online OR
                 <a href="http://redhotandblue.com/pdf/EmploymentApp.pdf">
                  Click here to download an Employment Application
                 </a>
                 .
                </p>

          Email Our Catering Experts:
          <br/>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   jQuery( document ).ready( function() {
					var ajaxurl = 'http://redhotandblue.com/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php';
					if ( 0 < jQuery( '.fusion-login-nonce' ).length ) {
						jQuery.get( ajaxurl, { 'action': 'fusion_login_nonce' }, function( response ) {
							jQuery( '.fusion-login-nonce' ).html( response );
						});
					}
				});
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   function revslider_showDoubleJqueryError(sliderID) {
					var errorMessage = "Revolution Slider Error: You have some jquery.js library include that comes after the revolution files js include.";
					errorMessage += "<br> This includes make eliminates the revolution slider libraries, and make it not work.";
					errorMessage += "<br><br> To fix it you can:<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1. In the Slider Settings -> Troubleshooting set option:  <strong><b>Put JS Includes To Body</b></strong> option to true.";
					errorMessage += "<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2. Find the double jquery.js include and remove it.";
					errorMessage = "<span style='font-size:16px;color:#BC0C06;'>" + errorMessage + "</span>";
						jQuery(sliderID).show().html(errorMessage);
				}
  </script>
